name: fdt-entry
description: Represents a BACnet Foreign Device Table (FDT) Entry, which contains registration information for a foreign device in a BACnet/IP network, including its address and time-to-live values.

fields.name: bacnetip-address
fields.description: The BACnet/IP address of the foreign device.

fields.name: time-to-live
fields.description: The configured time-to-live value in seconds for this FDT entry.

fields.name: remaining-time-to-live
fields.description: The remaining time in seconds before this FDT entry expires.
